https://tmrev.io/movie/44074-Cease Fire 2022-11-27
https://image.tmdb.org/t/p/w500null A couple (Golzar & Afshar) who have been bickering & fighting from day one, are contemplating divorce until by chance they both end up visiting a therapist (Pesiani) who dishes them the secrets of a good relationship. Various episodes from the couple's married life are represented as flashbacks in a lighthearted manner. Cease Fire
